00016 #include "G4Electron.hh"
00017 #include "G4Positron.hh"
00018 #include "G4OrderedTable.hh" 
00019 #include "G4PhysicsTable.hh"
00020 #include "G4PhysicsLogVector.hh"
00021 #include "BDSComptonEngine.hh"
00022 #include "BDSPlanckEngine.hh"
00023  
00024 class BDSPlanckScatter : public G4VeEnergyLoss
00025  { 
00026   public:
00027  
00028      BDSPlanckScatter();
00029  
00030     ~BDSPlanckScatter();
00031 
00032      G4bool IsApplicable(const G4ParticleDefinition&);
00033      
00034      G4double GetMeanFreePath(const G4Track& track,
00035                               G4double previousStepSize,
00036                               G4ForceCondition* condition );
00037  
00038      G4VParticleChange *PostStepDoIt(const G4Track& track,         
00039                                      const G4Step&  step);                 
00040 
00041      inline void SetTemperature(G4double aTemperature);
00042      inline G4double GetTemperature();
00043 
00044   protected:
00045 
00046      virtual G4double SecondaryEnergyThreshold(size_t index);
00047 
00048   private:
00049 
00050      BDSPlanckScatter & operator=(const BDSPlanckScatter &right);
00051      
00052      BDSPlanckScatter(const BDSPlanckScatter&);
00053 
00054      const std::vector<G4double>* secondaryEnergyCuts;
00055 
00056 private:
00057     G4double itsTemperature;
00058     BDSComptonEngine* itsComptonEngine;
00059     BDSPlanckEngine* itsPlanckEngine;
00060     G4double itsPlanckMeanFreePath;     
00061 };
00062 inline G4bool BDSPlanckScatter::IsApplicable(
00063                             const G4ParticleDefinition& particle)
00064 {
00065    return(  (&particle == G4Electron::Electron())
00066           ||(&particle == G4Positron::Positron()) );
00067 }
00068 inline G4double BDSPlanckScatter::GetMeanFreePath(const G4Track& track,
00069                                            G4double PreviousStepSize,
00070                                            G4ForceCondition* ForceCondition)
00071 {  
00072 *ForceCondition= NotForced ;
00073 return itsPlanckMeanFreePath;
00074 }
00075   
00076 
00077 inline void BDSPlanckScatter::SetTemperature(G4double aTemperature)
00078 {itsTemperature=aTemperature;}
00079 inline G4double BDSPlanckScatter::GetTemperature()
00080 {return itsTemperature;}
00081 
00082 inline G4double BDSPlanckScatter::SecondaryEnergyThreshold(size_t index)
00083 {
00084   return (*secondaryEnergyCuts)[index];
00085 }
